availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Evans (Logan Co, Ky, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. North Carolina native. Married to Francis Evans. Father of Araannah Evans, Elizabeth Evans, William H. Evans, John Evans, Currenna Evans, Ellen Evans. Farmer in Muhlenberg County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 216B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 594.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
